languages.text: {n}На сумрачном лице возникает слабая, но радостная улыбка.{/n} "Прикончить пару ксеносов? Нет, от такого я не откажусь никогда".
{n}A faint but mirthful smile appears on his gloomy face.{/n} "Kill a few xenos? I would never say no to that."
languages.original_text: {n}На сумрачном лице возникает слабая, но радостная улыбка.{/n} "Прикончить пару ксеносов? Нет, от такого я не откажусь никогда".

languages.text: {n}Un petit sourire réjoui se dessine sur son visage morose.{/n} « Tuer quelques xénos ? Voilà une proposition qui ne se refuse pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}A faint but mirthful smile appears on his gloomy face.{/n} "Kill a few xenos? I would never say no to that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un petit sourire réjoui se dessine sur son visage morose.{/n} « Tuer quelques xénos ? Voilà une proposition qui ne se refuse pas. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}他阴沉的脸上露出了一丝黯淡而又愉悦的笑容。{/n}“多杀几个异形？这种事情我绝对不会拒绝。”
languages.original_text: {n}A faint but mirthful smile appears on his gloomy face.{/n} "Kill a few xenos? I would never say no to that."

traits.locale_text: {n}他阴沉的脸上露出了一丝黯淡而又愉悦的笑容。{/n}“多杀几个异形？这种事情我绝对不会拒绝。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼の憂鬱そうな顔に、かすかだが楽しげな笑みが浮かんだ。{/n}「ゼノを何人か殺すだと？俺が断るわけがないだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}A faint but mirthful smile appears on his gloomy face.{/n} "Kill a few xenos? I would never say no to that."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼の憂鬱そうな顔に、かすかだが楽しげな笑みが浮かんだ。{/n}「ゼノを何人か殺すだと？俺が断るわけがないだろう」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}In seinem finsteren Gesicht erscheint ein schwaches, aber frohes Lächeln.{/n} "Ein paar Xenos töten? Dazu würde ich niemals Nein sagen."
languages.original_text: {n}A faint but mirthful smile appears on his gloomy face.{/n} "Kill a few xenos? I would never say no to that."

traits.locale_text: {n}In seinem finsteren Gesicht erscheint ein schwaches, aber frohes Lächeln.{/n} "Ein paar Xenos töten? Dazu würde ich niemals Nein sagen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Una tenue pero alegre sonrisa ilumina su sombrío rostro.{/n} «¿Matar xenos? Nunca diré que no a eso».
languages.original_text: {n}A faint but mirthful smile appears on his gloomy face.{/n} "Kill a few xenos? I would never say no to that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una tenue pero alegre sonrisa ilumina su sombrío rostro.{/n} «¿Matar xenos? Nunca diré que no a eso».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Adamın kasvetli yüzünde hafif ama neşeli bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Zeno mu öldürüyoruz? Hayatta kaçırmam."
languages.original_text: {n}A faint but mirthful smile appears on his gloomy face.{/n} "Kill a few xenos? I would never say no to that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adamın kasvetli yüzünde hafif ama neşeli bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Zeno mu öldürüyoruz? Hayatta kaçırmam."
